reg.acttitle: Hotel Room Tax Act; Provincial Sales Tax Act*
reg.title: Hotel Room Tax Regulation for the City of Chilliwack

section.sectiontext: In this regulation, Act means the Hotel Room Tax Act.
Section 3 (1) of the Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased in the City of Chilliwack.
The tax payable under section 3 (1) of the Act is 2% of the purchase price of accommodation purchased in the City of Chilliwack.

section.marginalnote: Prescribed purpose for expenditure of tax
section.sectiontext: The City of Chilliwack may spend the amount paid to it out of the revenue collected from the tax for tourism marketing, programs and projects.
This regulation is repealed effective July 1, 2017.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 526/2004.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1
